title: Microsoft Office ProPlus 2010 SP2 VL x86 en-US Baseline
description:
murphy78 presents Office 2010 ProPlus VL SP2 x86 Baseline

File Name:
Office2010-PPVL-SP2-x86-en-US-Baseline.iso
Size: 1.42 GiB
Sha-1: 6CEE21B5CBD59326F5653A28AAB1242FE88BDD3F

Since there is no official Office 2010 ProPlus with SP2 in either retail or VL,
I've created one using the original volume image for Office 2010 ProPlus and the
Office 2010 SP2 KBfile.

Sources:

File Name:
SW_DVD5_Office_Professional_Plus_2010_W32_English_MLF_X16-52536.ISO
Size: 731 MB
Sha-1: 9F1D385A8989C4D4951B55F0EDFAEA9066B8F54E

File Name:
officesp2010-kb2687455-fullfile-x86-en-us.exe
Size: 638 MB
Sha-1: FAA6E4D481E8AE534CBF47AFC46C22DC4F43EE3C

The Process is simple. you take the *en-us.msp, *none.msp, and proof-es-es.msp,
files and stuff them in the updates folder of the VL disc.
You then re-ISO it using oscdimg. It's not important to use oscdimg, but it makes
a higher quality source file IMO since the files will be in the appropriate
location every time given the same parameters. In my case the parameters were only
using -u1 which enables both old 8.3 iso format and new UDF format. This is
standard for MS discs.

How to activate: The default key is set to the gVLK. You *Can* enter a MAK if you
wish. The process would be something like this:
cscript ospp.vbs /inpkey:xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx
cscript ospp.vbs /act (Activate Online your MAK)

I've included a link to Microsoft Toolkit. You should be able to use MTK to
activate this on any OS. You need .Net 4.x installed to use it.

This version has no updates and is meant to be used as a patch source to save
bandwidth every month for people who like to have a current version with all the
MSP hotfixes included. You can use this as-is or patch it to a newer version when
I release them.

Credits:
murphy78 - ISO Design, Integration, Testing

Enjoy Pirates,
murphy78 - TPB/MDL
